# PKAddPassButton

**Class**

Provides a button that enables users to add passes to Wallet.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class PKAddPassButton
```

## Overview

When you use the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPassButton] class to create a button, you choose the button’s style, and the system provides a control with the correct appearance.

## Creating add pass buttons

- **init(addPassButtonStyle:)**: Initializes a new Add Pass button.

## Accessing the button’s style

- **addPassButtonStyle**: A constant representing the button’s style.

## Button styles

- **PKAddPassButtonStyle**: The appearance of the buttons that can be created using the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddPassButton/addPassButtonWithStyle:] method.

## Common data types

- **PKObject**: An opaque type that acts as the superclass for the pass object.
- **PKLabeledValue**: An object that can represent a detail about a payment card or other item.
- **AddPassToWalletButton**: A type that provides a button that enables people to add a new or existing pass to Apple Wallet.
- **AddPassToWalletButtonFilter**
- **AddPassToWalletButtonResponse**
- **AddPassToWalletButtonStyle**

## Inherits From

- UIButton

## Conforms To

- CALayerDelegate
- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible

- Hashable
